content: Return to the Keeper's Shrine and continue past it, following the path to the right. Head down to the slope, collecting the green Wisp on the left and into the center of the room. As you reach the middle, you'll be met by the first of the bosses in this secret area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_5_Secret-Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 Secret - Bishui Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Purge Pit'.
The content is as follows:
Return to the Keeper's Shrine and continue past it, following the path to the right. Head down to the slope, collecting the green Wisp on the left and into the center of the room. As you reach the middle, you'll be met by the first of the bosses in this secret area.
